definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Liujiaxia to Shaanxi Province in cross-border 330 kilovolt transformer lines and over.

sentences.english: You can best use board-mount miniature POTs for anything you want to set-and-forget.

sentences.english: The powerhouse is designed to be of shaft and semi-underground type and the substation of open type.
sentences.chinese: 廠房採用豎井半地下式佈置，開敞式變電站。

sentences.english: In the first, the paper presents the current situation and development trends of the inverters .
sentences.chinese: 本文首先介紹了逆變電源的發展現狀及趨勢。

sentences.english: In this paper, an on-line monitoring device for fast transient overvoltages on substations is designed.
sentences.chinese: 本文設計了一個變電站瞬時過電壓在線監測系統。

sentences.english: Application of life cycle costs analysis in planning design of power transformation projects .
sentences.chinese: 全壽命週期成本分析在變電工程規劃設計中的應用。

sentences.english: Their common principle is to use the variable capacity in a condenser .
sentences.chinese: 它們的普遍原理是利用電容器的可變電容。

sentences.english: A bicycle handle is provided with a variable resistor for adjustment of bicycle speed.
sentences.chinese: 車把上設有可調節車速的可變電阻。

sentences.english: We also observed acoustic waves are converted from alternating electric signal in the formation.
sentences.chinese: 在井中激勵交變電場時，井內可以接收到聲波。

sentences.english: Production and living wastewater of the substations shall meet national or local discharge standards.
sentences.chinese: 變電所的生產及生活污水應符合國家或地方排放標準。

sentences.english: A large-signal nonlinear model is created to simulate the system dynamic response.
sentences.chinese: 因此，建立了弧焊逆變電源的大信號非線性模型。

sentences.english: Substation territory is locked with door bolt from the 19th century.
sentences.chinese: 自從19世紀以來，這個變電所區域就被封鎖起來。

sentences.english: An intelligent equipment which can transmit degrees of ammeters in power system is designed.
sentences.chinese: 設計了一種用於電力變電站的智能抄表裝置。

sentences.english: Substation locating is an important part of power system planning.
sentences.chinese: 變電所選址是電力系統規劃的一個重要環節。

sentences.english: The substation equipped with a transformer of 500 KVA is at the south of the plant.
sentences.chinese: 在工程的南邊有一座裝有五百千伏安變電器的變電站。
